Package hac.ex4.controllers

Class StoreController

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.controllers.StoreController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class StoreController extends Object
a controller for all the actions that can be made by the book store user

  • Method Details

    • store

      @GetMapping("") public String store(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      model - through this param, we transfer information to other pages
      Returns:
      the main book store page

    • storeSearch

      @PostMapping("/search") public String storeSearch(@RequestParam String keyword, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      keyword - a keyword to represent a partial book name to find
      model - through this param, we transfer information to other pages
      Returns:
      the resulted books after the search in a new page

    • storeAddToCart

      @PostMapping("/addToCart") public String storeAddToCart(@RequestParam("id") long id)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book whom the user wants to add to the cart
      Returns:
      the main page refreshed, with the cart items updated

    • storeCart

      @GetMapping("/viewCart") public String storeCart(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      model - through this param, we transfer information to other pages
      Returns:
      the cart page with all the items the user added

    • deleteBookFromCart

      @GetMapping("/removeFromCart/{id}") public String deleteBookFromCart(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Parameters:
      id - the book that the user wants to remove from the cart
      Returns:
      the cart page after the book removal - could be an empty cart

    • deleteBook

      @GetMapping("/emptyCart") public String deleteBook()
      Returns:
      the cart page after it was cleared of all books

    • storePay

      @GetMapping("/pay") public String storePay(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      Parameters:
      model - through this param, we transfer information to other pages
      principal - holds the spring security username that's currently paying
      Returns:
      a page that shows whether the payment was successfully made or not
